definitions.definition: the world or the state of things as they actually exist, as opposed to an idealistic or notional idea of them.
synonyms: actuality; Moretruth; physical existence "distinguishing fantasy from reality"

definitions.definition: a thing that is actually experienced or seen, especially when this is grim or problematic.
a thing that exists in fact, having previously only existed in one's mind.
examples: the paperless office may yet become a reality

definitions.definition: the quality of being lifelike or resembling an original.
the state or quality of having existence or substance.
examples: youth, when death has no reality

definitions.definition: existence that is absolute, self-sufficient, or objective, and not subject to human decisions or conventions.
